title: Just got a FREE loss in series
body:
So i just got in my series to plat ... (pretty stoked because season ends tommorow) so ive been really try hard.. 

I get into first game of series and client crashes.... Insta free win.. 

I was in lobby chatting just fine.. Even got the mid laner to trade me for jungle.. (my main role) 

then CRASH and i now have 1 loss in a 5 game series.. 



come on STOP making ONE DODGE count as a loss please... we are not responsible for one dodge.. 
Give us one free dodge in a series.. 

Maybe some guy locked in double adc or even 4... and everyone wants to play that to prove a point.. 

maybe some guy is in the lobby raging and threatening to feed on purpose before the game ever starts.. 
PLEASE rito give us one free dodge in series.. 

So that when the client crashes it doesnt count

replies.body:
Client crashes often occur as a result of a poor connection to the matchmaking servers. I encourage you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it will assist you in configuring your network to be compatible with League and should prevent future client crashes during crucial moments.

Let me know if those steps helped.
I am kind of salty about that... Honestly client crashes beyond my control and it counts as a loss...
